question: Which one is the correct statement about the recently launched Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation or KALIA Scheme? 1.All farmers will be provided Rs 10,000 per family as assistance for cultivation. 2.The scheme includes a life insurance cover of Rs 2 laky. 3.The scheme will be an area-specific scheme. Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: KALIA scheme was launched by Odisha state government. It Involves payments to encourage cultivation and associated activities. It will assist the elderly, sick and differently-abled population.
